name: make_hemi_mask
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Generates a hemisphere mask by registering input to the left/right reversed version using mri_robust_register, then keeps only the selected hemisphere.

inputs.description: Hemisphere to keep ('lh' for left hemisphere, 'rh' for right hemisphere)
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Output masked MRI volume file (e.g. output.mgz)
inputs.name: Output File
